name: UIFocusUpdateContext
desc: An object that provides information relevant to a specific focus update from one view to another.

items.name: var previouslyFocusedView: UIView?
items.desc: The view that was focused before the focus update.

items.name: var nextFocusedView: UIView?
items.desc: The view that takes the focus after the focus update.

items.name: var focusHeading: UIFocusHeading
items.desc: The heading in which the focus update is occurring.

items.name: struct UIFocusHeading
items.desc: The general type of an event.

items.name: var previouslyFocusedItem: UIFocusItem?
items.desc: The item that was focused before the update.

items.name: var nextFocusedItem: UIFocusItem?
items.desc: The item to be focused after the update.

items.name: class let didUpdateNotification: NSNotification.Name
items.desc: The focus for the UI has been updated.

items.name: class let movementDidFailNotification: NSNotification.Name
items.desc: The focus failed to move to another item.
